about_the_game:
With the memory of their struggle buried deep in their hearts...

Fight your way through fierce battles with a variety of means to defeat your enemies. With multiple difficulty options and a wide selection of jobs and weapons available to customize your party, you can choose exactly how you want to play.

Will restoring the crystals' light usher in peace or a new form of darkness? ...Or perhaps something else entirely?

This game features memorable locales from other entries in the FINAL FANTASY series.

Pravoka Seagrot recalls Sastasha of FINAL FANTASY XIV. Beyond the cave's mystical landscape of vividly colored coral lies the pirates' hideout where their ship is anchored.

Hallowed Massif recalls Mt. Gagazet of FINAL FANTASY X. Fierce blizzards and avalanches impede the progress of travelers, while graven figures sleep within the mountain.

Other areas and battle music also draw inspiration from the main titles in the series, providing FINAL FANTASY fans with plenty of familiar tidbits to stoke nostalgia and make the game even more enjoyable.

*Various game contents require an internet connection.

highlighted.name: A Tale of Origins and Endings
The King of the Dark Elves

content_descriptors.notes: Please be aware that scenes containing depictions of violence that is not suitable for all ages are included during gameplay.

detailed_description:
STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN - Deluxe Edition


Product Contents
• STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN (main game)
• Season Pass (includes additional missions: "Trials of the Dragon King," "Wanderer of the Rift" and "DIFFERENT FUTURE")
• Digital art book
• Digital mini soundtrack

*Various game contents require an internet connection.
*The main game must be cleared first to play season pass contents.


STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN - Season Pass


Additional Bonus with Purchase of Season Pass
Now including a complete Warrior of Light equipment set. Featuring 400% knight job affinity and other special effects, this equipment set is designed with tackling high-difficulty content in mind.
*The main game must be cleared first to obtain the Warrior of Light equipment set.
*Customers who have already purchased the season pass can also obtain the Warrior of Light set.

A set consisting of the additional missions "Trials of the Dragon King," "Wanderer of the Rift" and "DIFFERENT FUTURE." Features new equipment, abilities and enemies along with new missions and story content.

*Various game contents require an internet connection.
*The main game STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN (sold separately) and related updates are required to play this add-on content.
*There are other products available for purchase containing these missions. Please be careful not to purchase the missions in duplicate.
*The main game must be cleared first to play season pass contents.


About the Game

With the memory of their struggle buried deep in their hearts...

Fight your way through fierce battles with a variety of means to defeat your enemies. With multiple difficulty options and a wide selection of jobs and weapons available to customize your party, you can choose exactly how you want to play.

Will restoring the crystals' light usher in peace or a new form of darkness? ...Or perhaps something else entirely?

This game features memorable locales from other entries in the FINAL FANTASY series.

Pravoka Seagrot recalls Sastasha of FINAL FANTASY XIV. Beyond the cave's mystical landscape of vividly colored coral lies the pirates' hideout where their ship is anchored.

Hallowed Massif recalls Mt. Gagazet of FINAL FANTASY X. Fierce blizzards and avalanches impede the progress of travelers, while graven figures sleep within the mountain.

Other areas and battle music also draw inspiration from the main titles in the series, providing FINAL FANTASY fans with plenty of familiar tidbits to stoke nostalgia and make the game even more enjoyable.

*Various game contents require an internet connection.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400 / Intel® Core™ i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30FPS (1280x720)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 / Intel® Core™ i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 XT / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60FPS (1920x1080)

short_description: Developed in cooperation between Square Enix and Team NINJA (Koei Tecmo Games), STRANGER OF PARADISE FINAL FANTASY ORIGIN is a hard-core action RPG that takes the FINAL FANTASY series in a new direction. Experience the boldest and most merciless battles in FINAL FANTASY history.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
